page.title: 05PARISH MEETING CONT.
page.content: { It was mentioned that the village was commended in the{National Tidy Village contest last year. The chairman thanked the scouts, guides and other groups for helping to keep the village tidy and free of litter. Efforts were being made to secure the use of playing fields at the site of {St.Peter's School}from{S.P.Gainford. The company has stated that they would make some facilities available. Other tasks carried out by the council in the past year were establishing where public footpaths were, and improving dimly lit areas. Another job the council was pleased to see completed was the improved junction from{Eden Lane}which made a dangerous corner much safer. Finally, parishioners thanked the council for their achievements.
